text: Niels Ryberg Finsen (December 15, 1860 â€“ September 24, 1904) was an Icelandic- Faroese doctor. He won the 1903 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for treating lupus vulgaris (tuberculosis of the skin), with light radiation. == References == Category:1860 births Category:1904 deaths Category:Danish physicians Category:Faroese people Category:Danish Nobel Prize winners
